official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to determine whether individuals entitled to benefits under the medicare program meet the requirements for status as qualified medicare beneficiaries under the medicaid program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to determine whether individuals entitled to benefits under Medicare part A (Hospital Insurance) qualify for Medicaid payment of their Medicare out-of-pocket expenses.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to determine whether individuals entitled to benefits under the medicare program meet the requirements for status as qualified medicare beneficiaries under the medicaid program, and for other purposes.
